description: Prefer gentleman in local California Bay Area. No out of state or out of US country. Only contact if live in California (preferably Bay Area). I can make that special good man very elated and lucky to have me. Want to make that special guy want to Smile because I bring joy into his life.enjoy travel, music, concerts, dancing, bicycling, summer fun activities, skydiving, moderate skiing, travel, horseback riding, fishing, sailing, strolls in the park, etc. (I am single female, active and just want to enjoy life with a potential mutual companion)
